Name: Barbara West
Ingredients: 37.5 ml Lustau Amontillado Los Arcos Sherry
10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Your choice of amontillado sherry may dramatically affect the balance of this gin and sherry sour. Choose well and you're in for a treat.
History: Adapted from a recipe in Stanley M. Jones' 1977 Jones' Complete Barguide . This classic could date from the 1930s.
Nutrition: One serving of Barbara West contains 158 calories
